original_text: And he wrote there upon the stones a copy of the law of Moses, which he wrote in the presence of the children of Israel.
korean_text: 여호수아가 거기서 모세가 기록한 율법을 이스라엘 자손의 목전에서 그 돌에 기록하매

sentences.original_text: And he wrote there upon the stones
a copy of the law of Moses
which he wrote in the presence of the children of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 그는 이스라엘 자손들 앞에서 기록했다
